summary: TRANSMISSION FAILED AT 83K MILES.  THE 2-3 AND 3-4 GEAR SLIPS.  ACCORDING TO MERCEDES MECHANICS, THE TRANSMISSION NEEDS TO BE REBUILT.  THEY ALSO SAID THAT THIS IS A COMMON PROBLEM WITH THE 1997 E-CLASS MERCEDES.  THE ATF, WHICH IS SUPPOSED TO BE CHANGE AT 100K, DID NOT PROTECT THE TRANSMISSION AS ADVERTISED.   ONE MECHANIC, SPECIALIZED IN REPAIRING MERCEDES,  HAD REPLACED OVER 10+ TRANSMISSIONS FOR THE SAME MODEL YEAR.    *NLM
